summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $56.00 from the General Fund to be paid Arthur P. Sherry as a rebate of excessive assessment levied against lots one (1) and two (2), block three (3), Terry's Fourth Addition, for the construction of a sewer in Jackson Street, et al under Ordinance No. 12944, creating Local Improvement District No. 1169, and repealing Ordinance No. 13782, approved May 24, 1906.
